Detailed Description

template<typename INC_ORDER = membar_relaxed, typename READ_ORDER = membar_relaxed>
class cds::atomics::item_counter< INC_ORDER, READ_ORDER >

Atomic item counter.

This class is simplified interface around atomic<size_t>. The class supports getting of current value of the counter and increment/decrement its value.

Template parameters:
  • INC_ORDER - default memory order for increment/decrement operations
  • READ_ORDER - default memory order for value() method
